name: Rise up - Special Anime
description:
Rise Up in the Air - Anime edition is one of the most challenging and fun games of 2018.

Rise up and protect your character  with your light ball  while it's rising up! Be aware of the obstacles.

Use your finger to move your light ball to protect your character from the object falling from the sky.

In the game you can collect some gold to unlock awesome and very fun characters :) !

Clear your way as you rise up in the air !

Challenge your friends to know if you're the best :)

Features :
• Totally free game ( no In app purchase)
• Classic mode and challenge mode.
• Classic mode : Endless game, try to reach the highest score !
• Mode Challenge : Try to complete all of them !
• Collect the gold to unlock new characters
• Awesome and fun characters to be dicovered !

New Characters will be added in the future, so check for the updates !
Don't forget : Rise Up, Rise Up, Rise Up, Rise Up, into the Air !

Rise Up free casual endless game top fun arcade original anime character great graphics obstacle
